local_intent: Grasp the fridge handle: detect, position and orient, align precisely, close gripper at force 20, then verify grasp stability.
assumptions: Handle is within reachable workspace and visible from current view
Gripper is functional and initially open
coherence_with_global: Implements the grasp phase of the global plan: DetectObject → MoveAbove → SetTCPYaw(90) → ApproachAndAlign(tol=0.005) → CloseGripper(20,800) → IsGraspStable, matching the corresponding steps before opening the hinged door.
